reviewText: I was a little disappointed with this purchase.  The film itself was a pretty standardpirate tale.  Certainly not a bad film, but also not one of the better ones of the genre.Rhonda Fleming is lovely as always, but the whole affairs comes off as pretty lightweight.Of more concern was the poor quality of the film transfer.  I have ordered quite a few of the dvd-rburn-on-demand studio archive titles and have found very inconsistant quality across the board.Some transfers appear clean and crisp while others appear faded with poor resolution.  This mightbe acceptable if these titles were sold cheaply, but at close to $20 a disc, the studios need to doa much better job.
Title: The Golden Hawk

reviewText: The Golden Hawk is an okay pirate movie, based on a popular novel. I don't think I could sit through it twice.
Title: The Golden Hawk

reviewText: Some old movies making their reappearance bring us back to G rated movies (maybe PG) without all of the realism of today's. Great to watch with grandchildren and just to remember. c/ork
summary: Pirate Movies without blood and gore
Title: The Golden Hawk

reviewText: another excellent movie from the golden years of hollywood with great actors in it i would recommend thismovie to anyone also fantastic stuff
Title: The Golden Hawk

reviewText: What more can you say than that name.  She conjures up visions of flame red hair and an angelic face.  I will say that there are better pirate movies out there (Captain Blood, The Sea Hawk, The Black Swan, Captain Horatio Hornblower (not really a pirate movie in my book, but a period piece to be sure), and others).  For me having Rhonda in this flick makes the movie.  She brings her own spitfire passion to the film, which makes it better.  IMHO
Title: The Golden Hawk

reviewText: The Golden Hawk is a good old fashioned pirate movie, with a little less action than usualbut nevertheless an enjoyable presentation.
summary: The Golden Hawk is a good, old fashioned pirate movie.
Title: The Golden Hawk

reviewText: It was a good period movie with great color, background, and storyline. It would have been a better movie with another leading man. I don't have anything against Sterling Hayden, but he really was not a great actor.
Title: The Golden Hawk
